title: Symetmetry of Quadratics
text: Quadratics have the same output left and right of the vertex. So, if there is a vertex V, then $$f(v-c)=f{\left(v+c\right)}$$.
speech: Quadratics have the same output left and right of the vertex. So, if there is a vertex V, then  f of, parentheses v minus c,  is equal to f of, parentheses v plus c,  .

title: Solving the Offset
text: Set the value of $$x$$ to be one of the supposed x-intercepts: $$2+c=-1$$.

title: Finding the Other X-Intercept
text: Since c is $$-3$$, the other x-intercept can be found by using the opposite equation: $$f{\left(2+3\right)}=f(-1)$$
